## serialWrite() function

This function writes `txBuf` to the serial device.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function serialWrite(handle: number, txBuf: Uint8Array): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handle


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The serial device handle as returned by [serialOpen()](./lgpio.serialopen.md)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

txBuf


</td><td>

Uint8Array


</td><td>

The array of bytes to write


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
